presentationTable.name: Facts - Job Requisition Progress
presentationTable.description: A folder containing measures related to requisition progression from one phase to the other computed in days

presentationColumns.name: Time Elapsed (Days) From Draft Phase to Approval Phase
presentationColumns.description: Time duration between the earliest start of the Draft phase and the latest start of the Approval phase.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Event.Time Elapsed (Days) From Draft Phase to Approval Phase

localization.localizationKey: Time Elapsed (Days) From Draft Phase to Approval Phase

presentationColumns.name: Time Elapsed (Days) From Approval Phase to Job Formatting Phase

localization.localizationKey: Time Elapsed (Days) From Approval Phase to Job Formatting Phase

presentationColumns.name: Time Elapsed (Days) From Job Formatting Phase to Posting Phase
presentationColumns.description: Time duration between the earliest start of the Job Formatting phase and the latest start of the Posting phase.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Job Requisition Event.Time Elapsed (Days) From Job Formatting Phase to Posting Phase

localization.localizationKey: Time Elapsed (Days) From Job Formatting Phase to Posting Phase

presentationColumns.name: Time Elapsed (Days) From Posting Phase to Open Phase
presentationColumns.description: Time duration between the earliest start of the Posting phase and the latest start of the Open phase.

localization.localizationKey: Time Elapsed (Days) From Posting Phase to Open Phase

presentationColumns.name: Time To Fill
presentationColumns.description: Number of days between job requisition opened to when it is filled.
